title: Portland Domestic Violence Shelter Selects Broadview’s Cloud-Based OfficeSuite® Phone for its Critical Communications
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/29/2015 @ 3:00 AM Companies mentioned in this article: Broadview Networks 
RYE BROOK, N.Y. -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Broadview Networks ® , a leading cloud-based provider of communications and information technology services, was selected by the Bradley Angle House to manage its critical communications. The Bradley Angle House has served those affected by domestic violence for over forty years, providing services of safety, education, empowerment, healing and hope throughout Portland, Oregon. 
The Bradley Angle House was one of the first shelters in Portland to trust its 24-hour crisis line service to a Voice over IP (VoIP) phone system. As of a result of its strong relationship with VisionQuest Communications , a West Coast telecommunications agent that recommends Broadview’s OfficeSuite ® Phone as its hosted VoIP/cloud phone and UC system of choice, the Bradley Angle House entrusted OfficeSuite ® Phone with its most vital communications. 
“It is critically important that our 24-hour crisis line service be up and running when anyone is in trouble or in need of our assistance,” said Ann Hawkins, Office Manager at the Bradley Angle House. “We know we have the very best partners and solutions for reliability with OfficeSuite ® Phone and VisionQuest Communications.” 
The women’s shelter and crisis line management is so pleased with the advanced functionality and reliability of OfficeSuite ® Phone that they have plans to implement the system in their administrative building, housed in a separate location. OfficeSuite ® Phone gives multi-site organizations like the Bradley Angle House the ability to unify all of their locations. Employees will be able to experience seamless communications and redirect calls to other offices and mobile phones with a click of a button via Broadview’s intuitive portal, MyOfficeSuite ™ . With OfficeSuite ® , employees can use any phone at any office while maintaining their own extensions and personal preferences, including voicemail. 
Broadview Networks ® is proud to be a preferred technology partner for telecommunications agents and organizations nationwide. “VisionQuest Communications is proud to represent and provide Broadview Network’s list of superior telecommunications products to our clients in the Oregon and Washington area,” stated Shadowhawk, President, VisionQuest Communications . 
Learn more about OfficeSuite ® Phone . 
About Broadview Networks ® www.broadviewnet.com 
Broadview Networks is a network-based business communications provider serving customers with local and long-distance voice and data communications, premises-based and patented hosted VoIP systems, data services and a full suite of managed and professional services. It also provides an innovative portfolio of bundled, hosted IP phone and cloud computing services designed to meet the unique application requirements of diverse workforce groups. Its customers benefit from award-winning customer service, including a Web-based account management tool and a primary point-of-contact for real-time, personal customer care.
